name: TIMESCAPE: Altitude
description:
One of a series of planned Escape rooms in different, unique, locations and situations.
The game focuses on Observation, listening, logic, cunning, and physical puzzles. Keeping you
immersed, the puzzles logically fit with the situation, and don’t force a mini game where
it would not belong.

Story

You have interfered with the plans of a rival who has left you to die on a plane, along with some expendable cargo. The pilots are gone, and the plane is flying itself. How long the plane will last in the air, is a guess. Best to get out, as quickly as possible.

Key Features

Hint system and menu controls are fit into the location, so you never have to exit, to make changes.
Hints are based on progress, so you’ll never get a hint that is not relevant.
The game is part non linear, so you can chose how you progress. If one puzzle is giving you a
problem, spend time on another for a while.


It’s VR, designed for full room-scale/standing tracking with motion controllers. Can play seated, but you would still need to reach to the floor to pick things up.
Switchable movement controls. Adjustable height Controls.
Adjustable difficulty levels.
  • Level 5 is for Super Escape Genius-Level Brains.
  • Level 3 is the standard level.
  • Level 1 is more casual, or for people who are new to escape rooms.


Playtime can be 1.5-3 hours depending on difficulty, and skill.
